wiki.content: Christina Perri gained overnight success after performing her song 'Jar Of Hearts' on American TV show 'So You Think You Can Dance' – it was also featured in an episode of 'Glee'! Inspired by a real-life experience about an ex-boyfriend wanting to rekindle a broken relationship, this debut single climbed to No.4 in the UK chart in August 2011. User-contributed text is available under the Creative Commons By-SA License and may also be available under the GNU FDL.
wiki.summary: Christina Perri gained overnight success after performing her song 'Jar Of Hearts' on American TV show 'So You Think You Can Dance' – it was also featured in an episode of 'Glee'! Inspired by a real-life experience about an ex-boyfriend wanting to rekindle a broken relationship, this debut single climbed to No.4 in the UK chart in August 2011.
